<a id="PhysicalBone3D"></a>

# PhysicalBone3D

**Inherits:** [PhysicsBody3D](PhysicsBody3D.md) **\<** [CollisionObject3D](CollisionObject3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A physics body used to make bones in a [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) react to physics.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The **PhysicalBone3D** node is a physics body that can be used to make bones in a [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) react to physics.

\ **Note:** In order to detect physical bones with raycasts, the [SkeletonModifier3D.active](SkeletonModifier3D.md#SkeletonModifier3D_property_active) property of the parent [PhysicalBoneSimulator3D](PhysicalBoneSimulator3D.md) must be ``true`` and the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md)'s bone must be assigned to **PhysicalBone3D** correctly; it means that [get_bone_id()](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_method_get_bone_id) should return a valid id (``>= 0``).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **DampMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode)

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_DAMP_MODE_COMBINE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode) **DAMP_MODE_COMBINE** = `0`

In this mode, the body's damping value is added to any value set in areas or the default value.<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_DAMP_MODE_REPLACE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode) **DAMP_MODE_REPLACE** = `1`

In this mode, the body's damping value replaces any value set in areas or the default value.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **JointType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType)

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_JOINT_TYPE_NONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **JOINT_TYPE_NONE** = `0`

No joint is applied to the PhysicsBone3D.<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_JOINT_TYPE_PIN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **JOINT_TYPE_PIN** = `1`

A pin joint is applied to the PhysicsBone3D.<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_JOINT_TYPE_CONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **JOINT_TYPE_CONE** = `2`

A cone joint is applied to the PhysicsBone3D.<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_JOINT_TYPE_HINGE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **JOINT_TYPE_HINGE** = `3`

A hinge joint is applied to the PhysicsBone3D.<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_JOINT_TYPE_SLIDER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **JOINT_TYPE_SLIDER** = `4`

A slider joint is applied to the PhysicsBone3D.<a id="PhysicalBone3D_constant_JOINT_TYPE_6DOF"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

A 6 degrees of freedom joint is applied to the PhysicsBone3D.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_damp** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_angular_damp**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_angular_damp**\ (\ )

Damps the body's rotation. By default, the body will use the [ProjectSettings.physics/3d/default_angular_damp](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_physics/3d/default_angular_damp) project setting or any value override set by an [Area3D](Area3D.md) the body is in. Depending on [angular_damp_mode](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp_mode), you can set [angular_damp](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp) to be added to or to replace the body's damping value.

See [ProjectSettings.physics/3d/default_angular_damp](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_physics/3d/default_angular_damp) for more details about damping.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode) **angular_damp_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_angular_damp_mode**\ (\ value\: [DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode)\ )
- [DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode) **get_angular_damp_mode**\ (\ )

Defines how [angular_damp](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp) is applied.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector3](Vector3.md) **angular_velocity** = `Vector3(0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_velocity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_angular_velocity**\ (\ value\: [Vector3](Vector3.md)\ )
- [Vector3](Vector3.md) **get_angular_velocity**\ (\ )

The PhysicalBone3D's rotational velocity in *radians* per second.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_body_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **body_offset** = `Transform3D(1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_body_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_body_offset**\ (\ value\: [Transform3D](Transform3D.md)\ )
- [Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **get_body_offset**\ (\ )

Sets the body's transform.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_bounce"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **bounce** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_bounce)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bounce**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_bounce**\ (\ )

The body's bounciness. Values range from ``0`` (no bounce) to ``1`` (full bounciness).

\ **Note:** Even with [bounce](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_bounce) set to ``1.0``, some energy will be lost over time due to linear and angular damping. To have a **PhysicalBone3D** that preserves all its energy over time, set [bounce](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_bounce) to ``1.0``, [linear_damp_mode](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp_mode) to [DAMP_MODE_REPLACE](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_constant_DAMP_MODE_REPLACE), [linear_damp](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp) to ``0.0``, [angular_damp_mode](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp_mode) to [DAMP_MODE_REPLACE](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_constant_DAMP_MODE_REPLACE), and [angular_damp](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_angular_damp) to ``0.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_can_sleep"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **can_sleep** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_can_sleep)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_can_sleep**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_able_to_sleep**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the body is deactivated when there is no movement, so it will not take part in the simulation until it is awakened by an external force.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_custom_integrator"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **custom_integrator** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_custom_integrator)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_custom_integrator**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_using_custom_integrator**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the standard force integration (like gravity or damping) will be disabled for this body. Other than collision response, the body will only move as determined by the [_integrate_forces()](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_private_method__integrate_forces) method, if that virtual method is overridden.

Setting this property will call the method [PhysicsServer3D.body_set_omit_force_integration()](PhysicsServer3D.md#PhysicsServer3D_method_body_set_omit_force_integration) internally.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_friction"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **friction** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_friction)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_friction**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_friction**\ (\ )

The body's friction, from ``0`` (frictionless) to ``1`` (max friction).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_gravity_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **gravity_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_gravity_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_gravity_scale**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_gravity_scale**\ (\ )

This is multiplied by [ProjectSettings.physics/3d/default_gravity](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_physics/3d/default_gravity) to produce this body's gravity. For example, a value of ``1.0`` will apply normal gravity, ``2.0`` will apply double the gravity, and ``0.5`` will apply half the gravity to this body.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_joint_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **joint_offset** = `Transform3D(1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_joint_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_joint_offset**\ (\ value\: [Transform3D](Transform3D.md)\ )
- [Transform3D](Transform3D.md) **get_joint_offset**\ (\ )

Sets the joint's transform.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_joint_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_joint_rotation**\ (\ value\: [Vector3](Vector3.md)\ )
- [Vector3](Vector3.md) **get_joint_rotation**\ (\ )

Sets the joint's rotation in radians.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_joint_type"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **joint_type** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_joint_type)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_joint_type**\ (\ value\: [JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType)\ )
- [JointType](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_JointType) **get_joint_type**\ (\ )

Sets the joint type.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_damp** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_linear_damp**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_linear_damp**\ (\ )

Damps the body's movement. By default, the body will use [ProjectSettings.physics/3d/default_linear_damp](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_physics/3d/default_linear_damp) or any value override set by an [Area3D](Area3D.md) the body is in. Depending on [linear_damp_mode](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp_mode), [linear_damp](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp) may be added to or replace the body's damping value.

See [ProjectSettings.physics/3d/default_linear_damp](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_physics/3d/default_linear_damp) for more details about damping.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode) **linear_damp_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_linear_damp_mode**\ (\ value\: [DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode)\ )
- [DampMode](PhysicalBone3D.md#enum_PhysicalBone3D_DampMode) **get_linear_damp_mode**\ (\ )

Defines how [linear_damp](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_damp) is applied.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector3](Vector3.md) **linear_velocity** = `Vector3(0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_linear_velocity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_linear_velocity**\ (\ value\: [Vector3](Vector3.md)\ )
- [Vector3](Vector3.md) **get_linear_velocity**\ (\ )

The body's linear velocity in units per second. Can be used sporadically, but **don't set this every frame**, because physics may run in another thread and runs at a different granularity. Use [_integrate_forces()](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_private_method__integrate_forces) as your process loop for precise control of the body state.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_property_mass"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **mass** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_property_mass)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mass**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_mass**\ (\ )

The body's mass.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_private_method__integrate_forces"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_integrate_forces**\ (\ state\: [PhysicsDirectBodyState3D](PhysicsDirectBodyState3D.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_private_method__integrate_forces)

Called during physics processing, allowing you to read and safely modify the simulation state for the object. By default, it is called before the standard force integration, but the [custom_integrator](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_property_custom_integrator) property allows you to disable the standard force integration and do fully custom force integration for a body.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_method_apply_central_impulse"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **apply_central_impulse**\ (\ impulse\: [Vector3](Vector3.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_method_apply_central_impulse)

Applies a directional impulse without affecting rotation.

An impulse is time-independent! Applying an impulse every frame would result in a framerate-dependent force. For this reason, it should only be used when simulating one-time impacts (use the "_integrate_forces" functions otherwise).

This is equivalent to using [apply_impulse()](PhysicalBone3D.md#PhysicalBone3D_method_apply_impulse) at the body's center of mass.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_method_apply_impulse"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **apply_impulse**\ (\ impulse\: [Vector3](Vector3.md), position\: [Vector3](Vector3.md) = Vector3(0, 0, 0)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_method_apply_impulse)

Applies a positioned impulse to the PhysicsBone3D.

An impulse is time-independent! Applying an impulse every frame would result in a framerate-dependent force. For this reason, it should only be used when simulating one-time impacts (use the "_integrate_forces" functions otherwise).

\ `position` is the offset from the PhysicsBone3D origin in global coordinates.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_method_get_bone_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_bone_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_method_get_bone_id)

Returns the unique identifier of the PhysicsBone3D.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_method_get_simulate_physics"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **get_simulate_physics**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_method_get_simulate_physics)

Returns ``true`` if the PhysicsBone3D is allowed to simulate physics.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBone3D_method_is_simulating_physics"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_simulating_physics**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBone3D_method_is_simulating_physics)

Returns ``true`` if the PhysicsBone3D is currently simulating physics.
